attributes.additional_details: Gyms are very important, not only for physical health but mental health as well. Exercise releases endorphins & can help to strengthen the immune system. People have been going to gyms since July, sanitising equipment, staying apart from each other, they shouldn’t have to close when there’s no sufficient evidence of a rise since they opened.
attributes.background: Gyms & leisure centres shouldn’t be closed, they need to be open

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
